name: dxData
description: Software and tools related to the dxData system for client/server data exchange
readme: Software and tools related to the dxData system for client/server data exchange

scripts.build: npm run clean; npm run build:dxData; npm run build:mockServer
scripts.build:dxData: browserify --debug src/dxBasics.js src/layer*/js/*.js | exorcist dist/dxData.js.map > dist/dxData.js
